filters.query: ( ("quote" OR "estimate" OR "service" OR "repair" OR "install" OR "ac repair" OR "furnace install" OR "broken" OR "not working" OR "no heat" OR "no cool" OR "maintenance") OR subject:(urgent OR emergency OR asap) ) AND -("unsubscribe" OR "payment" OR "newsletter" OR "invoice" OR "job application")

nodes.name: Gmail Trigger - HVAC Lead Capture
nodes.notes: Monitors dedicated leads@hvacvendor.com with precision filters for HVAC-related keywords while excluding spam and non-lead communications.

nodes.name: Lead Parser & Classifier
nodes.notes: Extracts key data from email and classifies as Residential or Commercial based on domain, keywords, and job titles.

nodes.name: HVAC BANT Scoring Engine
nodes.notes: Implements the complete HVAC BANT scoring matrix: Urgency (30), Service Specificity (20), Authority (15), Budget (20), Contact Info (10), Pain Points (15), Lead Type Bonus (15). Threshold: >60=Hot, 31-60=Warm, <=30=Cold

nodes.name: Lead Router (by Score)
nodes.notes: Routes leads to appropriate action protocols based on qualification score.

nodes.name: Log to CRM/Google Sheets - Hot Lead
nodes.notes: Creates immediate CRM record for hot lead with full contact details, score breakdown, and timestamp.

parameters.name: text

nodes.name: Notify Sales Team - Slack (Hot Lead)
nodes.notes: Sends instant high-priority notification to #hot-leads Slack channel with all key lead details and direct CRM link.

parameters.subject: =Re: {{$json.subject}} - We received your request!
parameters.message:
=

Thank You for Your HVAC Service Inquiry!

Hi there,

We received your message regarding {{$json.subject}}, and we understand how important it is to get your system working properly.

Here's what happens next:

  • Our HVAC specialist will call you from (555) 123-4567 within the next 5-10 minutes
  • They'll discuss your specific needs and can schedule a same-day or next-day appointment

Prefer to book a time right now?

Click here to view our calendar and select a time that works best for you:
ðŸ“… Schedule Your Appointment

We look forward to helping you!

Best regards,
Your HVAC Company
(555) 123-4567
leads@hvacvendor.com

nodes.name: Send Personalized Response - Hot Lead
nodes.notes: Sends immediate personalized acknowledgment email with clear next steps and self-service scheduling link.

nodes.name: Log to CRM - Warm Lead
nodes.notes: Creates CRM record for warm lead tagged for 2-4 week nurture campaign.

parameters.subject: =Re: {{$json.subject}} - HVAC Information & Resources
parameters.message:
=

Thank You for Your Interest!

Hi there,

Thank you for reaching out about {{$json.subject}}. We'd love to help you with your HVAC needs!

To help you make an informed decision, we've put together some helpful resources:

  • Complete HVAC Buying Guide
  • Recent Customer Success Stories
  • Energy Savings Calculator

Ready to discuss your project?
Schedule a Free Consultation

One of our HVAC specialists will also reach out within 24-48 hours to answer any questions.

Best regards,
Your HVAC Company

nodes.name: Send Nurture Email - Warm Lead
nodes.notes: Initial nurture email with educational resources and soft call-to-action.

nodes.name: Analyze Disqualification Reason
nodes.notes: Determines if cold lead should receive referral or long-term nurture based on disqualification reason.

nodes.name: Cold Lead Router
nodes.notes: Routes cold leads to either referral email or long-term nurture campaign.

parameters.subject: =Re: {{$json.subject}} - Recommended HVAC Partner
parameters.message:
=

Thank You for Your Inquiry

Hi there,

Thank you for reaching out regarding {{$json.subject}}.

{{#if (eq disqualificationReason 'Out of Service Area')}} Unfortunately, your location appears to be outside our current service area. However, we want to ensure you receive the quality service you deserve. {{else if (eq disqualificationReason 'Non-HVAC Service')}} While we specialize exclusively in HVAC services, we want to make sure you're connected with the right professional for your needs. {{/if}}

We recommend:
Partner Company Name
Phone: (555) 987-6543
Email: info@partner-company.com

They have an excellent reputation and we're confident they can help you.

Best wishes,
Your HVAC Company

nodes.name: Send Referral Email
nodes.notes: Sends helpful referral to partner company for out-of-area or non-HVAC service requests.

nodes.name: Log to CRM - Cold/Nurture
nodes.notes: Creates CRM record tagged for 6-12 month educational nurture campaign.

parameters.subject: =Re: {{$json.subject}} - Helpful HVAC Resources
parameters.message:
=

Thank You for Your Interest

Hi there,

Thank you for your inquiry about HVAC services. While you may not be ready to move forward right now, we wanted to share some resources that might be helpful:

  • 5 Tips to Lower Your Energy Bills
  • Seasonal HVAC Maintenance Checklist
  • Understanding SEER Ratings

We'll occasionally send you helpful tips and reminders. When you're ready to discuss your HVAC needs, we're here to help!

Schedule a consultation anytime

Best regards,
Your HVAC Company

nodes.name: Send Long-Term Nurture Email
nodes.notes: Sends initial educational email for long-term nurture sequence.

nodes.name: Track KPIs - All Leads
nodes.notes: Logs all lead metrics for KPI analysis: response time, qualification rate, lead source performance, and conversion tracking.

main.node: Log to CRM/Google Sheets - Hot Lead
